12. KUDO may use your information for the following purposes: Operation data: Such information allows us to facilitate the delivery and optimization of the Services, monitor performance of our data centers and networks, provide account dashboards and reports, provide support, maintain the security of our infrastructure and Services, administer our disaster recovery plans and policies, detect, investigate and stop fraudulent, harmful, unauthorized or illegal activity ("fraud and abuse detection"), confirm compliance with contractual obligations, comply with legal obligations, and create anonymized and/or aggregated data to improve our products and for other lawful business purposes.
If you have a password protected KUDO account, we will use your account information to verify your identity.

data_type: personal datum collect from online meeting hold via kudo platform
text: KUDO will retain personal data collected from online meetings and conferences held via the KUDO platform for as long as the account holder remains an account holder of KUDO, and for a period of no more than one (1) year after termination or expiration of that account holder's status as an account holder.

data_type: personal datum generate in connection with services
text: In addition, when permitted by our Customer, KUDO processes personal data generated in connection with the Services, for the purposes of (a) analyzing meeting content to improve our language interpretation Services and (b) aggregating and de-identifying usage data and then using the resulting datasets for analytical and product improvement purposes.

We use commercially reasonable efforts to delete your personal data as required but retain records necessary to comply with a governmental authority or applicable federal, state, or local law.
For example, if you contact us using a form on our site or by email, telephone, or otherwise, we may keep a record of that correspondence.
We will process your request in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

We only share personal data with companies, organizations or individuals outside of KUDO when one of the following circumstances applies: With KUDO partners: If we received your personal data from a third-party partner and you become a User, we may disclose select personal data to that partner or their designee for the purpose of the partnership agreement; for example, to reward a referral partner from a co-sponsored event.
